attributes.action: Take legal action against any MP who misused their Official Credit Card.
attributes.background: It has been reported that 377 MPs misused their Official Credit cards and the Expenses Watchdog tried to hush up the matter up. This not acceptable and legal action should be taken against such MPs and the chair of the Expenses Watchdog.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

Complaints that MPs may have breached IPSA's rules are handled by an independent compliance officer. You can find out more about how complaints are handled here:
http://www.parliamentarycompliance.org.uk/makingacomplaint/Pages/default.aspx#howto
